website_summaries.verdict: It will work for some TVs, but some consumers find this stand to be more handsome than functional.
cons: Some owners find that panels or hardware don't line up as they should
It's not the best model for large, heavy TVs

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for Manufacturing Defects
customer_reviews.text: My purchases from Sauder in the past have been of good quality, but not this one. The TV Stand sent to me came with two major defects...both manufacturing defects. The first was a wrinkle in the finish on the top horizontal piece of the unit and the second was a broken vertical piece (K) on the bottom that was glued back together to hide the fact that it was broken. Since these pieces are on the top and front of the unit they are easily seen. I didn't find these defects until I was 80% complete with putting it together so I just finished the unit. I didn't have the energy to disassemble the unit and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love this Stand
customer_reviews.text: I'm very particular when it comes to entertainment centers like this. I typically like to Mount the TV on wall and have as little furniture as I can get away with. This however, suits my needs perfectly. It has space to fit a TV on top (42' pictured), 4 components with perforated holes in the back, and 2 cabinets with doors. Its made of particle board but because of the design it is very sturdy. Putting it together was a leisurely breeze, but I'm also a weird person who enjoys putting furniture together. The directions were straight forward and legible. It did not require glue, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: As usual, just what i expected...........
customer_reviews.text: i have built many Sauder Woodworking units over the decades and this one was no different than any of the others. Well packaged, delivered before promised, easy to assemble and now on display in my living room. This is UNLIKE several of the other vendors i and my friends bought from where the directions were conflicting and muddy at best with incomplete or erroneous pics to assist me in my quest. Sauder is the pioneer of this craft and continutes to excel. Wont waste my time with others in the future (i still need a white cabinet for bathroom), just go to Amazon, pick Sauder items to peruse and buy one of them. Keep up the great products you manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: red headed deb

customer_reviews.title: Good stand for the money-but NOT wood
customer_reviews.text: Good stand for the money-but NOT wood. Was a bit disappointed since several reviews listed it as wood but it is foe wood-better known as pressed board. None the less, it is heavy, looks like wood and looks very nice. Also was not at all hard to put together -took me about an hour and a half doing it by myself-with some help from my cat and 2 dogs! Lol! might have taken a little less time with out their help!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit, wouldn't call it "oak"
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this because I wanted a TV stand to match our other "honey oak furniture". What arrived was somewhat darker than pictured...I'd call it a light walnut, not mission oak. Still, it's a remarkably attractive TV stand. I'm impressed with the quality of the veneer: it's very realistic. for the most part, it was simple to put together. The hinges are quite tricky. I did it by myself, though a second pair of hands would have been handy at times, especially for that last step, the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: M. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: We were looking to replace a bigger unit. This Sauder piece is everything we hoped for. Took 2 of us to put the unit together, probably 2 1/2 hours or so. Instructions were very clear (with some humorous asides in the directions!). The final results were a sturdy, beautiful piece exactly suited to our needs. Would definitely recommend and love that most of Sauder’s items are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Lennox

customer_reviews.title: hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of this TV stand. I only giving this 3 stars as it was hard to put together. I had a friend come over to help and it took the 2 of us 4 hours to put it somewhat together. We could not get the doors to go on. So I put the doors in a closet for now. I don't think the screws that came with the hinge attachment are long enough. I am pretty sure that we tighten everything down, but the top does not sit right on side. When I feel up to messing with it some more I will have to figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F

customer_reviews.title: Solid entry for Sauder
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for our space. I am actually usually not a fan of Sauder and their particle board furniture, but I am starting to come around. The first one was damaged (crushed particle board, go figure), but the second one arrived in good shape. Assembly was fairly easy except for the doors. Attaching the door hinges was a pain, and the pull knobs on door were not thought through very well by manufacturer; its difficult to get them straight. I was worried it would be a light oak like most oak veneers on the market, but It is actually a darker color like the picture which gives it a classier appearance.
customer_reviews.author: G.D. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Sauder makes great put together furniture and this was not an exception! This is a well built and good looking TV Stand. I wasn't looking for an expensive piece of furniture and this style, and look fit in perfectly in this spare bedroom. Assembly instructions are long, but pretty precious and all the pieces and fasteners were there.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaele

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. But the stand is fairly heavy
customer_reviews.text: You do get what you pay for. Assembly was easy. But the stand is fairly heavy. The customer will have to slide it into place. If lifted by any shelf, [the ONLY way to lift it], the stand will fail and come apart. I will dissemble it, and glue it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this item!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy assembly and fit my entertainment enclosure as if was designed to go in there. It is a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Don Gates

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Just got done putting it together. The labeling sucks, some have stickers, some have written letters and others have little light brown letters that you can hardly see and one of them didn't have a letter at all. The product damages really easy so be careful putting it together. The pack-wood ships and cracks pretty easy along the edges. So as long as you put it together slowly and gentle, it will be fine. Other than that it looks great, the instructions were great and the finished product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ferras

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well packaged, arrived with no damage. Instructions were clear and all parts were labelled correctly. It's quite a project to assemble, but it looks great and seems quite sturdy. No problems with the doors or handles, I didn't even have to adjust them (although the instructions show how to adjust the doors in all three directions). The only reason I'm giving it four stars instead of five is that the back is cardboard. I'd gladly have paid more for a plywood backing.
customer_reviews.author: Cenbe

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy assembly, sturdy, but made of cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little entertainment centre! Easy to assemble, looks nice. Made of particle board, which I was somewhat expecting but hoped against. Seems sturdy. Was well packaged, though there was some minor superficial damage, but for a piece of furniture being shipped it's more than an acceptable amount in my opinion. Blemished are not glaring and only noticeable if already aware of them. Overall happy thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Loh

customer_reviews.title: All the parts were included and the instructions were pretty clear, except for the explanation of which door ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed any electronics in this stand yet, so I can't really comment on that, but I don't envision any issues with it. All the parts were included and the instructions were pretty clear, except for the explanation of which door was left and which was right. But we figured it out after a couple re-reads. All in all, very nice for the price. It's "put-together" furniture. If you're content with that, it's good. It's pretty heavy for its size, so we installed sliders on each corner. Now it's easy to move
customer_reviews.author: L Cranston

customer_reviews.title: very cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. I knew it was fake wood and did not expect much but did not realize the veneer is very thin paper which tore off the edge the first time I opened the door after it was installed. Middle shelf did not slide right in, I will have to sand one side to make t fit. Would return the stand but it is very heavy (being all pressed wood) and it would be impossible to disassemble and repackage it.
customer_reviews.author: H. R

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: good value for the money. good directions - took quite some time (expect AT LEAST one hour), but no issues in fit & finish. mostly particle board, this is not solid wood, though who would expect that for the price? overall, a decent piece of functional furniture, look s good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: The thing I like the best it's made in USA. I came very well packaged and undamaged. I've had China products damaged. I thought it was easy to put together , all parts fit perfectly. Looks pretty good for faux wood.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: It's really a nice piece of furniture. It's small and we had a few challenges when assembling it, but I would consider it an opportunity for learning. The only part we were missing was one of the tie plates. It's very sturdy and a beautiful piece. If you follow the instructions assembly is easy. We had it put together in about two hours and we're still married.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Casper

customer_reviews.title: Sauder TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece of furniture, Not difficult to assemble, instructions are easy to understand. At the end of the the assembly you do need a second pair of hands to turn over the unit in order to complete the job. I have purchased several Sauder products and so far has not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carla & John

customer_reviews.title: Great tv stand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've have this Sauder piece for a year now. It's wonderful. Looks so nice in my living room. I'm very handy so putting it together was easy. Once put together this tv stand is solid and heavy. I've received many compliments. When this arrived it was packaged very well. Nothing was out of place. I would purchase Sauder furniture in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to put together if doing it all by yourself. I did and I am 74. It was very easy, however, and the directions were very specific. Hardest thing was the doors by myself trying to hold them up and screw them in at the same time. If there were two doing that, it would be a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few hours to assemble, I took my time and had no problems. It is the perfect size for our tv and stereo. I added two pullout drawers to each cabinet for music cds. We get great comments from our guests.
customer_reviews.author: Deck

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's solid and nice looking once you put it together. I'm a builder and trim carpenter and it took me about 1 1/2 hours. I hate to admit but I did install one of the pieces backward and since I'd have to almost take the whole thing apart to correct it I decided to let it go. I'll be able to fix it and it's behind the doors so it's no big deal. Just take it slow.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Timothy Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Broke While Assembling
customer_reviews.text: I was going along with the assembling process just fine, following the instructions to a T. However, a piece of the particle board I was trying to secure on the stand broke, making it not able to hold the screw and, thus, not securing properly on the unit. This made it not feasible to continue assembling the unit. I'm very disappointed, especially since I know Sauder is a longstanding company and I paid $100+ for it.
customer_reviews.author: TheeCW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is beautiful. It comfortably supports a 40 inch flat-screen TV. The cabinet took three hours to put together. I wish the shelves had more room for DVDs. My combo VCR/DVD fits perfectly on the top shelf, but the DVDs have to be stacked because they do not fit sideways. I think I would be able to store more DVDs on one shelf if the shelves were just a few inches taller. This is a tiny complaint; do not hesitate to purchase this if you are considering a new TV cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: a bit disappointed in the weight carrying department
customer_reviews.text: Based on the add, a bit disappointed in the weight carrying department. Our tv weighs less than the max weight carrying capacity advertised by 23 lbs. Still the unit sags in the middle. Not very strong. Maybe good for about 40 lbs max.
customer_reviews.author: ARDENWORKS

customer_reviews.title: ... it really is not that hard (I am generally poor at these types of assemblies and hence avoid them)
customer_reviews.text: Prepare yourself for about 2 hours of set-up for this sucker but it really is not that hard (I am generally poor at these types of assemblies and hence avoid them). But this one is well worth the price for what I have seen TV stands going for around town. I put my 47" Samsung up there and it fits nicely, but I wouldn't put a much bigger TV on there than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, lazy packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, was delivered quickly, but very poorly packaged and was not easy to put together. The instruction manual was completely crushed and hard to unfold, which then made it difficult to open and read. Not only that, but none of the pieces were labeled (for example piece A, B, C,..etc..) So I had to focus a lot more on making sure I am using the right piece. Company must be too lazy to make it a little easier for you to know which piece you are using when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: James Durham

customer_reviews.title: Particle board
customer_reviews.text: Attractive but a bazillion pieces to put together and takes a long time. For the price I should have expected it was particleboard. It will do the trick as a TV stand for now, but probably not forever
customer_reviews.author: Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Good Stand
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is very good. It looks good in the room and has a lot of storage. Putting it together was easy also. The only thing is the color. I ordered oak and I would not call this oak. It looks more like a walnut finish to me. Other than that it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Gifford

customer_reviews.title: SAUDER TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Original came packed with a damaged panels...of course outside and top. well packed, corners padded. Had to be boxed with bad ,pieces. quality control at Sauder. Amazon replaced with new. it's smaller and lower than I'd like but fits beautifully in the spot. VERY happy with choice
customer_reviews.author: tax lady

customer_reviews.title: We are only giving it 3 stars because the assembly instructions were poor and confusing
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this unit for a TV in our home gym. The color is true to the photo and the quality is what you would expect for the price. We are only giving it 3 stars because the assembly instructions were poor and confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful furniture for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets are beautiful. Retry easy to put together. They look like expensive furniture. They look a little lighter in color than they are in person but I love them and have gotten so many good comments.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, put this is my living room with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, put this is my living room with the nice furniture with no problems fitting in. It isn't beautiful mind you, but simply does its job without screaming it's an economical piece of assembled furniture. I was able to put it together by myself with basic tools in several hours. Had some trouble getting the hinges attached, could have used an extra pair of hands for that.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Bug

customer_reviews.title: ... TV stand was exactly as described and looks very nice when assembled
customer_reviews.text: The TV stand was exactly as described and looks very nice when assembled. The assembly was not too difficult, but we did have trouble getting the doors on. The screws were made to thread as you screwed them into the wall section. However, it took a lot of pressure to do that. It would have been better to have had the screws made to go into the holes in the wall. We are still tying to get one door on. Other than that, the TV stand looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: gale b

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, sturdy, and exactly the perfect fit for my new 2 leg flat screen. I have received numerous positive comments on this stand. Easy to follow instructions. I highly recommend this tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Archable

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Don't usually like these cookie cutter furniture pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Don't usually like these cookie cutter furniture pieces but am happy with this one. Keep in mind when it says the TV size, it's really the stand width rather than the actual TV width. Could use a cutout behind the storage areas with the doors, wanted to put my modem in there to hide all the hideous lights on it. Easy enough to cut one out I guess.
customer_reviews.author: WannaKatana

customer_reviews.title: this is a good looking piece of furniture in my dad's living room ...
customer_reviews.text: Plus is that once finally assembled, this is a good looking piece of furniture in my dad's living room and nicely blends in with existing pieces. Downside is that it took almost three hours to assemble by my son who is a mechanical engineer. Now granted engineers do like everything perfect, so power tools were used to line up holes that did not match properly. Slight damage in back of unit, but that cannot be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best furniture for the bucks, hands down!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my latest piece of furniture from this company. Their items are heavy duty and super well priced for what they are. They put IKEA to shame. They are easy to assemble and extremely well designed and packaged for shipment. I also have a 5 foot long desk with integral hutch and a really nice printer stand. I would recommend their furniture to any one. All you need to assemble is a screw driver and your are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bayard H. Waterbury, III

customer_reviews.title: For flakeboard furniture this seems pretty well built
customer_reviews.text: For flakeboard furniture this seems pretty well built. The stickers on the pieces came off but if you take your time and read the instructions it wasn't too difficult to put together. I build and assemble things regularly so I knew what I was getting into but two hours later we had the stand together and were watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ebling

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Sauder Product
customer_reviews.text: The entertainment stand fits just beautifully in the room we bought it for. The color matches and highlights everything in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't time myself on the assembly, but it went pretty quickly and without any problems. All the parts were there and were marked as needed. The shipping packaging was great. All of the corners were well-protected, because this is where damage may occur. I didn't follow the directions when it came to using a drill-driver. The instructions don't want you to use one, because you might over-drive the screws. I very carefully used the tool to loosely fit the screws and then hand drove them home with a phillips head screwdriver. This saved time and wear and tear on tendons.and muscles. The finished product looks great and functions like it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This item is real nice and I love it. It is just like picture on the sight. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price and simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome TV stand very easy to put together and looks good after great price also I would purchase it again if I needed to
customer_reviews.author: robert lipponen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when finished!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the particle board come damage with dents and scratches but was able to fix it with a walnut stain. Fairly easy to put together plus no missing parts which is big because it's would be very disappointing if a part was missing. You couldn't finish the TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made and Nice TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Took one hour to assemble. Heavy and sturdy. Perfect color to match our existing entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: but it is gorgeous and sturdy. Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: This unit was not the easiest to put together, but it is gorgeous and sturdy. Mom loves it! The TV fits perfectly as well as her DVD and DVR units.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M2

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this TV stand. It goes well with my décor. The finish product is sturdy and will work well for my entertainment area. The instructions were easy to follow and my niece and I were able to get it put together within a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Putting together was a bit onerous but it is manufactured in such a way that it goes together nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: For the price, well constructed. Putting together was a bit onerous but it is manufactured in such a way that it goes together nice and solid. I actually went back and bought a second one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV stand it really does well supporting my 50inch flat screen. I gave the rating a four because some of the instructions were unclear so I had to take some of it apart and reassemble it. Once it was all together I really liked the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie  Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for medium oak. Bought for big screen TV. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect for my 32" TV. I am able to get all my DVD binders in the stand. More actually fits into the closed cabinets then I first thought. All of my things are nicely organized.
customer_reviews.author: Book Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Had a few minor blemishes but not really noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Nef

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain and look
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size has good storage area and I don’t have to see all the cords
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Good TV stand. Fairly easy to assemble with good assembly instructions. About as big as I expected too, good photo of it. Goes well I'd say in just about any room, mine's in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sauder TV Stand a great buy
customer_reviews.text: The Sauder Harvest Mill Panel TV Stand (Abbey Oak) is a great buy for the money. Took about 2 hours to assemble. Instructions were clear and pieces were easy to identify. No missing pieces or hardware. I was able to assemble it by myself. Packaging for shipping was exceptional. The original Sauder box was packed inside a shipping box. No damaged pieces, although my recycle bin was pretty full when it was all said and done ;) The assembled stand is heavy, sturdy and looks like a nice piece of furniture. I'm extremely happy with this purchase and would not hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to put together and the doors especially were a bit of a pain to attach, but the fit is good and everything fit together easy enough. The end result comes out looking very nice and fully set up there's little to no wobble to the structure. Plenty of space for everything. For the price range I think this stand is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: okay for price
customer_reviews.text: takes about 3 hours or more to assemble. one handle for door did not fit correctly remains loose and needs to be glued. does intended job of supporting new 50" tv. losts of shelves
customer_reviews.author: Alan T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This a a very nice looking and sturdy TV stand. My husband and I put it together without any major difficulty. The directions were very clear. I believe it took us 3 hours and were worked carefully and slowly.
customer_reviews.author: The Lady of the House

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got it in perfect condition. This was carefully packaged. Assembled without any problems-all parts aligned well. Color was as displayed in the listing (which matched other furniture in the room). I know this isn't heirloom-quality handcrafted furniture but I feel it is a good value for the price charged. It is just right for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Hults

customer_reviews.title: Appealing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very appealing and made of good quality. Sturdy. My only issue stems from fact that there are no holes in the cardboard backing for running cords from receivers or DVD players and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Well built and all pieces fit. Instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: G. Childs

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, but beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks awesome once it is put together...but putting it together is a major pain. Many of the screw holes are not aligned properly so you really have to force some pieces together to fit...however once it is put together it looks beautiful and is very sturdy. Made of particle board with a veneer on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey

customer_reviews.title: Sauder TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: The TV Stand assembly was actually easy and the resulting product was superb. I will gladly buy another Sauder product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sather

customer_reviews.title: If I had not put it all together I would have sent back because of the dings but they were not bad enough to go through the hass
customer_reviews.text: Product was much darker than represented on the website. Also there were many dings especially on the corners of the top. If I had not put it all together I would have sent back because of the dings but they were not bad enough to go through the hassle of packing it up again and shipping it back. Seems solid and looks nice. Putting it together was easy. All in all ok for the price except for the defects in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: caglrnh

customer_reviews.title: A little difficulty putting it together but it looks great now that it is completed
customer_reviews.text: A little difficulty putting it together but it looks great now that it is completed. Perfect size for space
customer_reviews.author: swimqueen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to assemble considering the size, and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: TomCurt

customer_reviews.title: A nice stand for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A nice stand for the price. Fake wood, but it looks good and works great.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was a little painful to set up but after it was done I loved it. Fits my 42" TV great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: What we needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to put our TV on it while we are on treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware pieces
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to put together. Most of the panels are not labeled, so you have to play the process of elimination game. Also missing multiple hardware pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Tenney

customer_reviews.title: I love my new TV Stand !
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and for a reasonable price. It's very sturdy and looks beautiful in my living room. Before ordering it, I compared it to many other TV stands but I didn't like that most of them were 'cheap'ly made. I have purchased other products from 'Sauder' & have been very happy with them too. All the pieces were included and they fit perfectly as described in the instructions. My son and daughter-in-law put it together for me. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Patty

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Harvest Mill Panel TV Stand - Abbey Oak
customer_reviews.text: This is your standard Sauder ware. It is laminated press-board, so don't put it anywhere near water! The one I have is in a living room and has faired very well! It doesn't get moved much and is not near water so it is holding up fine. I knew what I was buying. If you want 'real' wood, your going to pay pretty for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tubbss5

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful place to put my TV nice space to put items
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt it was just wayyyyyy too many parts for something like this, it could have maybe 30% simpler somehow
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assembly. Felt it was just wayyyyyy too many parts for something like this, it could have maybe 30% simpler somehow in the assembly design. Over complicated that part but Holds up ok and seems relatively sturdy I have a 46 inch TV that's relatively heavy and has no issues.
customer_reviews.author: SACRICIDE

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cabinet, hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it four stars because it looks lovely now, but I am very fortunate to have a handy man next door who was willing to help. Otherwise, I would have had to send it back. A drill hole was missing, and one of the pieces wasn't listed so he had to figure out what to do with it. Even with help the one knob is lower than the other. There is no way I could have put this together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Instruction were fairly easy to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was putting the hangers on the doors. Otherwise the instruction were fairly easy to put it together. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: Received the item early, and it was heavy, didn't take too long to put together, and when together it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Callow

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Product
customer_reviews.text: It was a great value and looks great in my living room 2 years later. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand, doesn't take up much space, unobtrusive and fits right in the rest of my furniture. Takes a bit to put together, but is very sturdy, materials are not cheap and flimsy like some.
customer_reviews.author: nicenirish

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy piece of furniture which surprised me for the price! The color is nice and the cabinets close quietly because they come with a little foam sticker to put on. It has holes for wires on every shelf! It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, no damage, no missing parts. Put together in about an hour and was the perfect size for our needs. Good quality for the price. Lay out all the pieces to make it easier to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: Materials
customer_reviews.text: Stop Molding designated as "L" attached to assembling instruction manual came warped causing difficulty in attaching to Credenza. Aside from that I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Garibay

customer_reviews.title: Good / Affordable furniture
customer_reviews.text: Sauder makes good/affordable furniture. Very solid for a piece you put together yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted and very sturdy. The finish is exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Put together with only once having to have my young son help put the finished product in place. Well crafted and very sturdy. The finish is exactly as pictured. Was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Theissen

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is perfect for our livingroom and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Magda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item. It looks great and can fit all of my devices very nicely. I am not good at assembly so I did not even attempt putting this together - It took my handyman about an hour. It arrived very quickly and there was no damage to any of the pieces. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: OblivionLA

customer_reviews.title: I am 71yrs and was a title hard for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 71yrs and was a title hard for me but l did not have help with help it was made well looks good
customer_reviews.author: BAB

customer_reviews.title: Still happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of Sauder products from Amazon, and I'm still satisfied. Go together well, arrive packaged well, and are substantially constructed. Not your standard cheap press board junk. Color in Amazon picture is very accurate, in case you're wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture. My husband had to make some slight adjustments when putting the doors on, but it looks awesome in our apartment. The back is made of some kind of composite material that is not very strong. That is the only downfall of this product. The color of the wood is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M Woods

customer_reviews.title: this stand is pretty sturdy and looks nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Folded backboard doesn't nail down flat and it's obvious when you seen uneven light reflections. Aside from that, this stand is pretty sturdy and looks nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk. I bought it for my living room and It has a nice form factor but has enough room to fit all your electronic and such. I have a 48 inch flatsceen on top and it is a good proportion, the only thing I didn't like was the back cover but this is the furniture you put together yourself so it's not like I didn't expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took approximately two hours but the end result was worth the time. Unit is attractive, sturdy and works with all TV accessories and related components. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Tools required screwdriver small hammer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble took about 30 min all of the pieces have letters on them follow instructions it's a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO PUT TOGETHER LOOKS GREAT GOOD PRICE FOR ITEMS
customer_reviews.author: scott warner

customer_reviews.title: Super piece of furniture for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks like a far more expensive piece of furniture ... is very solid, rich-looking woodgrain, and relatively easy to put together. It provided a great solution for us to have a good-looking, solid, non-overwhelming (size) tv stand for a small tv room. I really shopped around extensively, and was thrilled to have found and purchased this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Karen KC

customer_reviews.title: TV stand
customer_reviews.text: The drop off was a bit flaky, left at garage instead of doorstep as stated in dropoff notes. Was raining so the outside box was completed ruined, but fortunately the inside box kept the unit intact. Put it together in about 2 hours. Looks great, seems to work well with 46" flat panel TV - 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaB

customer_reviews.title: Don't have any components longer then 19" and you will be fine. Overall it looks great
customer_reviews.text: there was not enough information the dimension of the shelves and so everything didn't fit on it. Don't have any components longer then 19" and you will be fine. Overall it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be much nicer than I had anticipated, quite durable. I didn't assemble it myself so I'm not sure how difficult it was,but it did have a number of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: GolfQueen

product_meta.title: Sauder Harvest Mill Panel Tv Stand, For TV's up to 42", Abbey Oak finish
product_meta.description: Create a cozy and inviting atmosphere in your living room with this panel TV stand from the Harvest Mill collection. It accommodates up to a 42" TV, making it the ideal spot for all-day movie marathons, binge watching your favorite show or playing video games with your friends. It features divided open shelving that provides you with a dedicated space for storage of video and gaming components. Behind each door is a hidden storage area that makes for a convenient place to stow away books, board games and other household essentials – like the stuff you don't want your guests to see. It also includes an adjustable center shelf for you to move to different heights to fit the needs of items big and small. With its simple design and charming style, it will complement in any room of your home. Finished in Abbey Oak, this beautiful TV stand will give your home a fresh new look.
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to a 42" TV weighing 95 lbs. or less
Divided shelving provides dedicated storage for audio/video components
Storage area behind doors holds CDs and DVDs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars482 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
